biotools.summary: Polymorphism in microRNA Target Site (PolymiRTS) is a database of naturally occurring DNA variations in predicted and experimentally identified microRNA (miRNA) target sites. PolymiRTS aims to identify SNPs that might affect miRNA targeting in humans and mice.

bioschemas.name: PolymiRTS
